Text: Are the ones you encoded done with h264 or h263 codec?
Video codecs MPEG4 Codec, Audio Codec MPEG4AAC codec. Hope that helps.

I'm not sure of all the technical aspects but heres what I can tell you: Ipod classic and .flv not compatible.  The episodes that were encoded to mp4, some of them are broken cutting off after only 8 minutes. Other episodes had commercials. One movie had a french watermark going across the entire bottom of the screen and the other movie aspect ratio and sync are so fucked I was dumbfounded. This pack is more or less a tease.  Within the week I will download the movies, specials and seasons from credible sources.  I will then encode them to mp4.  Beyond that, I will actually check the files before I upload them.  

Uploader,shame on you.
Sara used to be hot, but kinda fell apart in the last season and by liquor day, she's pretty hit. a shame, really.
